folder: Lemon Creek Bridge, Staten Island, N.Y.
text:
(1)
Lemon Creek Bridge (Staten Island): Men operating the old drawbridge over which runs Johnston Terrace.

Summer, 1924

P. L. Sperr

(2)
A view from the south end of the bridge.

September 7, 1936

P. L. Sperr

(3)
An additional view of the same.

September 7, 1936

P. L. Sperr
